message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  While I see the value at $12,000, I'm willing to come down to $11,000. I think that's a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter your offer with $10,500. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
